page.title: 06EDUCATION.
page.content: { ENGLISH MARTYRS R.C.SCHOOL } The school celebrated its 100th year in 1984 but has only been on this site 18 years.It was completed in 1967.It cost 150,000 pounds to build 3,000 pounds for books and equipment, 6,000 a year for general maintenance and 2000 pounds a year for electricity,gas,heating.There are 205 children with roughly 28 children per class.The school has its own school cooks, caretakers,cleaners,a hall in which we do gym,have lunch,morning assembly and put on school plays. {SCARCROFT ROAD PRIMARY SCHOOL} Scarcroft school is nearly 100 years old.It has 177 children in six classes.It has a reading room,two halls,four cloakrooms,a tv room,a maths room,two libraries and a staff room.There are 21 rooms altogether.We have a big green to play on.
